0.user_question: Mary is baking a cake. The recipe calls for 3 cups of sugar and 10 cups of flour. She already put in some cups of flour. If she still needs 5 more cups of flour than sugar How many cups of flour did she put in?

ost_step.1: The recipe requires 3 cups of sugar and 10 cups of flour.
ost_step.2: Mary put in enough flour that she now needs 5 cups more of sugar.
ost_step.3: The amount of flour she put in so far is 10 + 5 = 15 cups.
